anyOf.description: Tree replace options for this object placer

treeTypes.description:
treeTypes
The types of trees overwritten by this object
   
List of TreeTypes

* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid TreeType (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

anyTree.description:
anyTree
If enabled, overrides any TreeType
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

sizes.description:
sizes
The size of the square of saplings this applies to (2 means a 2 * 2 sapling area)
   
List of TreeSizes (Objects)

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

anySize.description:
anySize
If enabled, overrides trees of any size
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

description: Tree replace options for this object placer

width.description:
width
The width of the sapling area
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 1

depth.description:
depth
The depth of the sapling area
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 1
